number of helpful: 22 of 29 people (76%) found this review helpful3 people found this review funny
content:
, 2015
												Another crappy game from a bundle pack that should have been retired instead of hastily ported to steam. The game is bad for a lot of reasons, but the biggest is its confusing interface. There isn't a tutorial mode, there are very few 'challenge' scenarios, theres no way of seeing when the next milestones are, building position seems to be irrelevant... The entire game is from another era - and while it might have some nostalgic value for a couple minutes, it definitely doesn't meet todays standards of a pay to play game -- it doesn't even hold up to most free games.

content:
1, 2016
												If you like Tycoon games then this is a good game since you get to assign prisoners work to do within the prison, the guards can do searches of the prisoners cells, you can put the prison into lockdown and put in the prison into riot mode where the guards dress in riot gear (you can also buy tear gas). Very good game only played a few hours so can not write a very big review of the game.

												Where to start with this game.... got it as part on an enticing bundle a while back, thought I'd give it a go and I spent the first 10 minutes trying to figure out how to hire staff due to the fact there is no guide or tutorial so if you don't know you have to guess until you give up and google. Quit trying to play the game after trying to figure out how to assign prison staff. Not worth the money, not worth the time playing this game! Prison Architect is 10x better!
